snippet: The Kremlin said on Wednesday it would check the veracity of a report in the New York Times to make sure that Russia's top anti-doping official had been accurately quoted when talking about doping in the country's sports system....
lead_paragraph: The Kremlin said on Wednesday it would check the veracity of a report in the New York Times to make sure that Russia's top anti-doping official had been accurately quoted when talking about doping in the country's sports system.

headline.main: Kremlin Says to Check Veracity of Russian Official's Doping Comments
headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says to Check Veracity of Russian Official's Doping Comments
